```{r}

### exercise 1
typeof(c(1, NA+1L, "C"))
#double (1) and integer (NA+1L) coerced to double and then double and character ("C") coerced to character 
typeof(c(1L / 0, NA))
#double and logical coerced to double
typeof(c(1:3, 5))
#integer and double coerced to double
typeof(c(3L, NaN+1L))
#integer and  double coerced to double
typeof(c(NA, TRUE))
#logical and logical => logical

```
